rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a decorative archway reflecting Kerala traditions and local materials. Provides ample space for greetings and initial impressions.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: A traditional Kerala bedroom featuring locally sourced wood and stone finishes, with an open balcony overlooking the front garden.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A secondary bedroom designed with a private veranda for relaxation and Vastu-aligned orientation towards east.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: A guest room or children's bedroom emphasizing Kerala aesthetics with natural ventilation and ample light.

rooms.name: Study/Living Room
rooms.description: An open space that integrates study and living area elements, designed for family gatherings and daily use while respecting Vastu principles by aligning entrance and windows.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated home theater with acoustically treated walls and ambient lighting to enhance cinematic experience; integrates Kerala motifs in its detailing.
